Pre-Game Insights: KL Rahul confirmed that Rohit Sharma wanted to take a rest considering the tough conditions in the UAE and the busy schedule in the lead-up to the T20 World Cup.
India also rested leg-spinner Yuzvendra Chahal and all-rounder Hardik Pandya and brought in Axar Patel and fast bowler Deepak Chahar.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan won the toss and opted to field on Thursday.
Teams chasing have won the majority of the matches in Dubai and India's losses against Pakistan and Sri Lanka in the Super 4 stage.
Others: India rested captain Rohit Sharma for their final Super 4 match against Afghanistan at Asia Cup 2022 in Dubai on Thursday, September 8.
